title: Workshop on Utilizing Mobile Microlearning Support Tools for Technology-Enhanced Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Professional development program for pre-service/in-service secondary teachers, focusing on language education design through smartphone-based learning design tools

learning_goals: Learners can develop mobile-friendly language lesson plans using technology-enhanced learning (TEL) design tools such as Phoebe.
Learners can structure teaching-learning activities by applying learning design tools even in environments with limited technology.
Learners can participate in formative assessment processes to iteratively improve their learning designs through peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
